Template: What water sports are available in <Place/Beach>

Cypher: MATCH p=(start{ns0__name:"<Place>"})-[:ns1__Visit]->(end) WHERE end:ns1__Well_Organized OR end:ns1__Partly_Organized RETURN p
MATCH p=(start:ns1__Village)-->(end:ns0__Beach) WHERE end.ns0__name="<Beach>" RETURN p

MATCH p=(start:ns1__Village)-[:ns1__Visit]->(m:ns0__Beach)-[:ns1__sandType]->(end) WHERE end.ns0__name="Black Sand" OR end.ns0__name= "Dark Grey Sand" OR end.ns0__name= "Black Sand and Pebbles" RETURN p

Template: Are there any well-organized beaches in <Place> and what can I do there?
